sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function Form() { const [formdata, setformdata] = useState({ firstname: "", lastname: "", email: "", comment: "", isfriend: true, sex: "" }); console.log(formdata); function handleSUB(event) { const { name, value, type, checked } = event.target; setformdata((prevdata) => ({ ...prevdata, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value })); } return (
